title: Evry Bronz Gem.
body:
Top: Play safe gies.
Top: Guys play safe.
*dies like hero*
guys play sef.
Guys stop dying.
Guys I can't see what's happening just ple sef guys.

Bot:  "noob top lane never ganks bot lane".
Top: "I don't have TP man why is bot always pinging me to assist when my lanes pushed".

Mid: GG. Someone died, afk.

Jungle: Why are all lanes noobs.

Support: Might just walk down river for no apparent reason and hope my carry doesn't notice I'm gone oh they died. Guess they didn't NOTICE I WAS GONE.

ADC: Why is their support always better than my support.

Oh God I won lane and my support is roaming, better push and bait out a 5 man so my support doesn't get ganked warding raptors.

Late Game: Group.

Group.
Group.
Group.
Group.
Group.
Group.
Group.

Group.
Group.Group.
ADC: Group.
Support: Group.
Jungler: Group
Top: guys why u no group mid? *roams top instead of grouping after asking for group.*
ADC - Says Group, *farms Wolves and then Gromp instead*.
Top: Guys group, *roams blue buff*

90% of Bronze: Why are you split pushing?

90% of Games: Team dies diving a tank instead of finishing game.

100% of Bronze: 0 faith.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A42NamLZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-30T06:35:24.421+0000)
>
> so accurate, but silver elo

yeah this is silver. bronze comes down to one thing. 5 men chase 1 guy top, lose inhibitor, gg.
